_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EML_TRI_CO_UT_checkIfSingleType
CMGT_EML_TRI_CO_UT_displayValue
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
displayvalue(
  
  ri!value,
  
  ri!inArray,
  
  ri!replacement,
  
  if(
    
    ri!firstIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[1],
    
    ri!lastIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[count(ri!replacement)],
    
    ri!customDefault
  )
)

_a-0000ecb5-acf8-8000-9cf6-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EML_TRI_QE_GetPolledMailDetails
_a-0000ecb5-acf8-8000-9cf6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!CMGT_EML_TRI_UTIL_QueryEntity(
  entity: cons!CMGT_EML_TRI_ENT_POLLED_MAIL,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CMGT_EML_TRI}CMGT_EML_TRI_MailPoller',
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "appMailPollerId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!appMailpollerId,
      applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!appMailpollerId)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "messageId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!messageId,
      applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!messageId)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "messageGraphId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!messageGraphId,
      applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!messageGraphId)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "status",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!status,
      applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!status)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters,

  },
  logicalExpression: ri!additionalLogicalExpression,
  returnType: a!defaultValue(
    ri!returnType,
    cons!CMGT_EML_TRI_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  pagingInfo: if(
    ri!returnType <> cons!CMGT_EML_TRI_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET,
    null,
    a!defaultValue(ri!pagingInfo,#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(1, cons!CMGT_INT_BATCH_SIZE_MEDIUM))
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EML_TRI_CO_UT_returnCdtFields

af326a29-a1c8-4399-a28d-996f85819d9e.name: CMGT_UTIL_Filter
af326a29-a1c8-4399-a28d-996f85819d9e.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    apply(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter_CreateFieldValuePair(
        field: _,
        value: ri!value,
        allFields: a!flatten(ri!field)
      ),
      a!flatten(ri!field)
    )
  ),
  local!matchingCriteria: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!matchingCriteria,
    default: "ALL"
  ),
  local!matchType: a!defaultValue(value: ri!matchType, default: "EXACT"),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter_Reducer(
        matchingCriteria: local!matchingCriteria,
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _,
        matchType: local!matchType
      ),
      a!match(
        value: local!matchingCriteria,
        equals: "ALL",
        then: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
        equals: "ANY",
        then: {},
        default: fn!error(
          "Invalid matchingCriteria, must be one of: ALL, ANY"
        )
      ),
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EML_TRI_CO_UT_returnSingleTypeObject

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EML_TRI_CO_UT_cast

_a-0000e882-ff68-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EML_TRI_QR_getMessages
_a-0000e882-ff68-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!CMGT_UTIL_QueryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Message,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Message.threadId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!threadIds,
      applywhen: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(ri!threadIds)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Message.createdBy,
      operator: "includes",
      value: ri!createdBy,
      applywhen: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(ri!createdBy)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Message.messageId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!messageIds,
      applywhen: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(ri!messageIds)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Message.messageId,
      operator: "not in",
      value: ri!excludeMessageIds,
      applywhen: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(ri!excludeMessageIds)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Message.messageRecipients.recipient,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!recipients
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Message.isActive,
      operator: "in",
      value: { a!defaultValue(ri!isActive, true) }
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  logicalExpressions: { ri!additionalLogicalExpressions },
  fields: {
    ri!fields,
    recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Message.messageText
  },
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  sort: ri!sort,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  groupByFields: ri!groupByFields,
  searchTerm: ri!searchTerm,
  searchFields: ri!searchFields
)

_a-0000ee5e-30bb-8000-9d99-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EML_TRI_UpdateThreadIdOnMessages
